description:
When nobody's looking, animals love to come together and organize bowling tournaments. Yep, they just love bowling!

This time, the turnout was amazing! The little lamb is here, the crocodile is here, and even the champion Piglet Joffrey is here!

Come on, it will be fun!

10 LOCATIONS

Bowl in the forest, desert, and many other parts of the world!

12 CHARACTERS

Many funny animals are waiting for you to play!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS

Up to 4 players on a single Nintendo Switchâ„¢ console!

CAMPAIGN

Defeat all rivals and challenge the champion, Joffrey Piglet!
name: Happy Animals Bowling
